headline: SPLG: S&P 500 Dashboard For September
summary: SPLG reflects an S&P 500 skewed by mega-cap gains, despite median overvaluation and sector imbalances. Learn why SPLG ETF is a hold.

headline: Do Edison International’s (EIX) Dividends Reveal a Strategic Bet on Stability Amid Rising Debt?
summary: On August 28, 2025, Edison International’s board declared semiannual and quarterly dividends across several series of preferred and preference securities, with payments scheduled for September 15, 2025 and varying record dates for shareholders. The dividend announcements come amid concerns over Edison International’s elevated debt levels and the increased scrutiny on its capital structure and cash flow sustainability. We’ll examine how these dividend declarations, set against rising...
